results.title: Your Spiritual Journey Insights
results.subtitle: Allah has guided you through this reflection. These insights are a gift to help you grow closer to Him.

overview.soulJourneyDesc: Every soul is on a unique journey towards Allah. These reflections show not weaknesses, but opportunities for beautiful growth and closeness to the Divine.
overview.gentleWisdom: Gentle wisdom to guide your spiritual growth
overview.quotation: "And whoever relies upon Allah - then He is sufficient for him. Indeed, Allah will accomplish His purpose." - Quran 65:3

habits.practicesDesc: These practices are lovingly chosen for you. Start small, be consistent, and trust that Allah will bless every sincere effort.
habits.startWhereDesc: Remember, every great Muslim started with small steps. Don't compare yourself to others - your journey is unique, and every small step is beloved to Allah.

plan.journeyDesc: Tazkiyah is a lifelong journey. This plan offers you a structured, gentle path toward spiritual growth, tailored to your individual needs.
plan.trustProcessDesc: Remember that spiritual growth is like the growth of a tree - it requires time, patience, and consistent care. Trust that Allah sees your efforts and blesses them.
plan.beginningDesc: You have taken a profound step in understanding your heart. This is not an ending, but the gentle beginning of a lifelong journey towards Allah.

completion.reflectOnInsights: Take your time to reflect on these insights. When you're ready, your dashboard awaits to help you put these practices into your daily life.
completion.blessing: May Allah bless your efforts and guide every step of your journey. Remember, He loves those who strive to purify their hearts.

envy.title: Envy and Jealousy
envy.question: How often do you feel envious or jealous when you see others succeed or have things you want?

arrogance.title: Pride and Arrogance
arrogance.question: How often do you feel superior to others or look down on people you consider beneath you?

selfDeception.title: Self-Deception
selfDeception.question: How often do you justify your mistakes or wrongdoings instead of acknowledging them honestly?

lust.title: Inappropriate Desires
lust.question: How often do you struggle with controlling inappropriate desires or sexual thoughts?

anger.title: Anger and Irritability
anger.question: How often do you lose your temper or become angry in your daily interactions?

malice.title: Hatred and Resentment
malice.question: How often do you hold grudges or feel lasting resentment toward people who have wronged you?

backbiting.title: Gossip and Backbiting
backbiting.question: How often do you speak negatively about people behind their backs or engage in gossip?

suspicion.title: Suspicion and Doubt
suspicion.question: How often do you assume the worst about others' intentions or motives without evidence?

loveOfDunya.title: Attachment to Worldly Things
loveOfDunya.question: How often do you find yourself overly focused on material possessions or worldly status?

laziness.title: Spiritual Laziness
laziness.question: How often do you delay or avoid acts of worship, good deeds, or spiritual practices?

despair.title: Hopelessness and Despair
despair.question: How often do you feel hopeless about your spiritual progress or Allah's mercy?
